text: My son attended the sessions for less than a year, and he has improved alot in his interactions, social skills, and also the meltdown episodes have decreased in intensity and frequency. He is more regulated now on average. He enjoys the sessions and requested to continue for the next year.  Thanks so much Teacher James and Nicole! I can sense your genuine passion and care for the children and families. Very much appreciated and we are very grateful!

My son T joined Brainy Moves when he was about to start P1. Within a few months, we could observe improvements in his psychomotor skills. He also became more confident and less shy when interacting with others. Most importantly, he really enjoys his weekly Brainy Moves sessions!

James and Nicole are both passionate and dedicated professionals. They genuinely care about their students and their progress. I would definitely recommend Brainy Moves.

Congratulations on Brainy Moves’ 10th anniversary! To many more good years!!

We started going to Brainy moves when my son was 3.5 yo. Now 1.5 years later, my son has shown so much improvement in gross and fine motor skills, awareness, and focus.
Brainy moves is an inclusive gym, James and Nicole are professional, kind, and passionate. We are so thankful for them. I highly recommend this gym. ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

My son gained confidence in interacting with others through your well-structured group activities and had improved in his motor skills and coordination. He enjoys going for your classes every week. Thank you Brainy Moves! You have played a big part in my son’s growth and development.

Thank you James and Nicole for your prompt feedback and update on my son’s progress and your advice on what we can do to follow-up at home.

Congratulations to your 10th year anniversary! Cheers to many more good years!

Brainy Moves helps to increase my child IQ and EQ. It also strengthen my child’s executive function. My child benefited from this brain gym. He enjoys this gym very much. Both James and Nicole are dedicated to coach the children. Two thumbs up! Highly recommended!
